thread.title: GE Names Beth Comstock as Its First Female Vice Chair
thread.title_full: GE Names Beth Comstock as Its First Female Vice Chair - WSJ

author: Ted Mann
title: GE Names Beth Comstock as Its First Female Vice Chair
text:
General Electric Co. Tuesday announced its marketing head, Beth Comstock, will take on a new role as vice chair, overseeing the company’s efforts to reap industrial earnings from advances in data analysis and software.
Ms. Comstock, 55 years old, is the first woman to hold the title, which is an executive role and not a seat on the GE board. Named GE’s chief marketing officer in 2003, Ms. Comstock also oversees the company’s... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
